text.author: Alex, ibrahim alarabi, Christian Babyak and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Pack Your Possessions When Moving
text.summary: This moving guide recommends packing each room, labeling and photographing what is in each box, filling sturdy boxes to the brim to allow for stacking, balancing heavy and light items so boxes can be lifted, marking fragile boxes and using bubble wrap or newspapers, getting free boxes from superstores (Walmart) and selling back boxes to U-haul.
